tweet: Great food can be had at home. Julia Childs demonstrated this nearly 100 years ago.
In itâ€™s most simplistic form - if it smells good and tastes good, then it is good. At least that is what our senses tell us.
Julia Childs brought much recognition to French Cuisine with television cooking shows over the last 60 years or so. She is amazing.
French cuisine has been around long before Napoleon and codified by chefs like Escoffier in the 20th century.
Believe it can be done. When you believe something can be done, really believe, your mind will find the way to do it.
